name: Chameleon
short_description: Chameleon is a group communication framework. As such, it simplifies building server-less, multi-peer connected applications for smartphones and some PC platforms. It is available in J2ME, J2SE, Android, .NET and .NET Compact Framework platforms.
summary: A multi-platform group communication framework for smartphones
